description: The Matka parka embodies the elegance of minimalism with its streamlined design and distinctive double hood. Featuring windproof and waterproof protection, this parka keeps you warm while wicking away moisture. Its down insulation provides proven protection against cold and dry conditions and optimal performance during low- to medium-intensity physical activities. Made from Bluesign® fabric-certified nylon and RDS-certified down, this long parka protects you from the coldest weather, especially at the back.
name: Matka IV Jacket - Womens

specs.value: White duck down, 80% down 20% feather, fill power of 700 in³
